Author: shinywetmeat
Text: I embraced the oversized t-shirt trend, they're big enough to hide my arms and stomach but still let a breeze through. Same thing with jeans, especially if they have some rips so I can cool off. I may look homeless but I don't get as many looks compared to the hoodies and sweats I would rather wear!

Author: livipup
Text: I'm excited to not have to bundle up, but over roughly the past year or so I've been sick and I get bloated really easy, so I'm not excited for warmer weather the way I otherwise would be. It really sucks. I love wearing crop tops, but not when I'm feeling gross.
